TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HtmlContainerControl extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl
Public MustInherit Class HtmlContainerControl Inherits HtmlControl

summary.span: 作为映射到需具有开始和结束标记的 HTML 元素的 HTML 服务器控件的抽象基类。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for HTML server controls that map to HTML elements that are required to have an opening and a closing tag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用的结束标记的最常见控制`
`， ``， ``， `
`， ``，和``元素。The most common controls with a closing tag are the ``, ``, ``, `
`, ``, and `` elements. 和属性使您可以操作开始和结束标记之间的内容-派生控件。The and properties allow you to manipulate the content between the opening and closing tags of -derived controls. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 不直接创建此类的新实例。A new instance of this class is not created directly. > [!CAUTION] > 如果你使用属性指定开始和结束标记的文本的 HTML 服务器控件之间的文本不是 HTML 编码。If you use the property to specify the text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control, the text is not HTML encoded. 这使得可能要在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 使用时属性，请务必验证的值以减少安全漏洞。When using the property, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities. 否则，请考虑使用属性改为。Otherwise, consider using the property instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的此类，以动态生成在网页上一条消息的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of this class to dynamically generate a message on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类使用默认值。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using default values. > [!NOTE] > 此类的实例不是直接创建。An instance of this class is not created directly. 从其他 HTML 控件类来初始化此类中定义的属性的构造函数调用此构造函数。This constructor is called from the constructor of other HTML control classes to initialize properties defined in this class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"分布"的文字字符串。The "span" literal string.|

summary.span: 创建一个新 对象来保存服务器控件的子控件（包括文本控件和服务器控件）。

span.span: Creates a new object to hold the child controls (both literal and server) of the server control.

summary.span: 获取或设置位于指定 HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content found between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.

value.span: HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的 HTML 内容。

span.span: The HTML content between opening and closing tags of an HTML server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式修改开始和结束标记的 HTML 服务器控件之间的内容。Use the property to programmatically modify the contents between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control. 属性不会自动编码 HTML 实体的特殊字符。The property does not automatically encode special characters to and from HTML entities. HTML 实体，可以显示的特殊字符，如`<`字符，通常会将浏览器解释为具有特殊含义。HTML entities allow you to display special characters, such as the `<` character, that a browser would ordinarily interpret as having special meaning. `<`字符将被解释为标记的起始和页面上不显示。The `<` character would be interpreted as the start of a tag and is not displayed on the page. 若要显示`<`字符，你将需要使用实体`<`。To display the `<` character, you would need to use the entity `<`. 例如，如果属性设置为`" Hello "`、`<`和`>`字符不会转换为`<`和`>`分别。For example, if the property is set to `" Hello "`, the `<` and `>` characters are not converted to `<` and `>`, respectively. 将仍将呈现的输出： \ Hello \< /b >。The rendered output would still be: \ Hello \. 浏览器将检测``标记，并以显示文本，大家好，加粗字体。The browser will detect the `` tags and display the text, Hello, in a bold font. > [!CAUTION] > 由于文本不是 HTML 编码，就可以嵌入在 HTML 内的脚本标记文本中。Because the text is not HTML encoded, it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果使用用户输入以动态方式设置此属性，请务必验证的值以减少安全漏洞。If this property is set dynamically using user input, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性和用户输入](~/docs/standard/security/security-and-user-input.md)。For more information, see [Security and User Input](~/docs/standard/security/security-and-user-input.md). 若要提供自动 HTML 编码和解码，请使用属性。To provide automatic HTML encoding and decoding, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果不有任何子控件，属性包含值。If there are no child controls, the property contains the value . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用动态设置文本消息的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to dynamically set a text message. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置位于指定 HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.

value.span: HTML 服务器控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本。

span.span: The text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式修改开始和结束标记的 HTML 服务器控件之间的文本。Use the property to programmatically modify the text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control. 与不同属性，属性自动对进出 HTML 实体的特殊字符进行编码。Unlike the property, the property automatically encodes special characters to and from HTML entities. HTML 实体，可以显示的特殊字符，如`<`字符，通常会将浏览器解释为具有特殊含义。HTML entities allow you to display special characters, such as the `<` character, that a browser would ordinarily interpret as having special meaning. `<`字符将被解释为标记的起始和页面上不显示。The `<` character would be interpreted as the start of a tag and is not displayed on the page. 若要显示`<`字符，你将需要使用实体`<`。To display the `<` character, you would need to use the entity `<`. 例如，如果属性设置为`" Hello "`、`<`和`>`符号转换为`<`和`>`分别。For example, if the property is set to `" Hello "`, the `<` and `>` symbols are converted to `<` and `>`, respectively. 将呈现的输出： < b > Hello < /b >。The rendered output would be: < b > Hello < /b >. `<`和`>`实体将指示这些字符均为要显示在页面上的浏览器。The `<` and `>` entities would indicate to the browser that these characters are to be displayed on the page. 浏览器不会检测到``标记并以粗体显示的文本。The browser will not detect the `` tags and display the text in a bold font. 在页面上显示的文本是： \ Hello \< /b >。The text displayed on the page is: \ Hello \. 若要防止自动 HTML 编码和解码，请使用属性。To prevent automatic HTML encoding and decoding, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果不有任何子控件，属性包含值。If there are no child controls, the property contains the value . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 HTML 编码服务可通过属性。The following code example demonstrates the HTML encoding service available through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlContainerControl.InnerText Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

param.name: savedState
param.span: 表示要还原的控件状态的 。

span.span: An that represents the control state to be restored.

summary.span: 从前一个由 方法保存的页请求还原 控件的视图状态。

span.span: Restores the control's view state from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法调用基类的方法。The method calls the base class's method. 此外，方法设置属性。In addition, the method sets the property.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The that receives the content.

summary.span: 将 控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写方法呈现的开始标记，子控件和结束标记的控件。The method overrides the method to render the opening tag, child controls, and closing tag of the control. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便正确呈现控件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is correctly rendered.

span.span: The instance that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

summary.span: 将 控件的结束标记呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the closing tag for the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用方法呈现的结束标记控件。The method is called by the method to render the closing tag of the control. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.
